results.title: Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to the use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism
results.text_hl: Our @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ received 80 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ without being diagnosed for @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@primary hypothyroidism@@@.

results.title: A double-blind placebo controlled trial of simvastatin for the treatment of dyslipidaemia in renal allograft recipients.
results.text_hl: A double-blind placebo controlled trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for the treatment of dyslipidaemia in renal allograft recipients.

results.title: Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism.
